title: 1997 Trophée des Champions
text: The 1997 Trophée des Champions was a <a href="association%20football">football</a> match held at <a href="Stade%20de%20la%20M%C3%A9diterran%C3%A9e">Stade de la Méditerranée</a>, <a href="B%C3%A9ziers">Béziers</a> on 23 July 1997 that saw <a href="1996%E2%80%9397%20French%20Division%201">1996–97 Division 1</a> champions <a href="AS%20Monaco%20FC">AS Monaco FC</a> defeat <a href="1997%20Coupe%20de%20France%20Final">1997 Coupe de France</a> winners <a href="OGC%20Nice">OGC Nice</a> 5–2.
